labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Armor Crypto" is primarily designed to interact with and manage cryptocurrency wallets and blockchain operations. Key functionalities include token balance queries, conversion, swapping, token transfers, wallet and group management, and DCA (Dollar-Cost Averaging) order handling. It provides comprehensive tools for executing trades, retrieving token details, and managing wallet organizations, all within a blockchain ecosystem.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Cryptocurrency & Blockchain" was chosen because the server's core tools revolve around blockchain interactions, such as trading, swapping, and wallet management. The secondary labels "File Management" and "Database Operations" were selected to reflect wallet and group management functionalities. No custom label is needed as the pre-defined categories adequately cover the server's features.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.overview: Access blockchain, bridging, swapping, staking, and crypto trading strategies for your agent. Leverage powerful tools to manage wallets and execute trades seamlessly across multiple cryptocurrency ecosystems.

tools.name: get_wallet_token_balance
tools.description: Deploy Server Armor Crypto Claim Server @armorwallet/armor-crypto-mcp Try in Playground get_wallet_token_balance

tools.name: conversion_api
tools.description: Perform token conversion. Expects a list of conversion requests with keys: input_amount, input_token, output_token.

tools.name: swap_quote
tools.description: Retrieve a swap quote. Expects a list of swap quote requests.

tools.name: swap_transaction
tools.description: Execute a swap transaction. Expects a list of swap transaction requests.

tools.name: get_token_details
tools.description: Retrieve token details. Expects a list of token details requests with keys such as 'query' and 'include_details'.

tools.name: list_groups
tools.description: List all wallet groups.

tools.name: list_single_group
tools.description: Retrieve details for a single wallet group. Expects the group name as a parameter.

tools.name: create_wallet
tools.description: Create new wallets. Expects a list of wallet names.

Archive wallets.

tools.name: archive_wallet_group

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@armorwallet/armor-crypto-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: armorAccessToken
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Access token for Armor API authentication.
